chapters.title: Prologue: Fortress of the Light
chapters.info: Dragon Reborn, p. 14 (2)—According to the Karaethon Cycle, the Prophecies of the Dragon, the Dragon Reborn is the man who is the Rebirth of Lews Therin Telamon, the man known as the Dragon during the War of the Shadow. Over the years, many men have claimed to be the Dragon Reborn, even men who could not channel. The true Dragon has been Reborn in a young man named Rand al'Thor, a shepherd from Emond's Field. See also Ablar, Logain; al'Thor, Rand; Amalasan, Guaire; Darksbane, Raolin; Davian; Stonebow, Yurian; Taim, Mazrim.
